messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

ongoing issues following incident windows machine sent wednesday re notification multiple unavailable hello still work for either least for myself still get certificate exception these days wed warning server certificate verification method enabled for more info wed note current script setting allow configuration call defined scripts wed socket buffers wed resolve wed attempting establish connection with wed connect wed connection established with wed client link wed client link remote wed wait wed wed initial packet wed verify error depth error self signed certificate certificate wed error bio error error routines get server certificate certificate verify failed wed error object incoming error wed error failed wed fatal error check errors restarting wed soft error received process restarting wed reconnecting error wed restart pause second thanks sent wednesday notification multiple unavailable importance high hello everyone please be informed have fully restored regarding for available for os also mobile devices android for those you work devices we send out instructions how fix for open issues thank you for your understanding kind regards

The problems seem to be directly impacting access to services, which aligns well with the "Access" category.
